meanings.definition: Not done or said because someone asked or told you to; voluntary.
meanings.sent1: She gave an unprompted apology for her mistake.
meanings.sent2: The unprompted act of kindness brightened his day.
meanings.sent3: His unprompted singing in the shower always makes us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unprompted burst of laughter echoed through the room.
meanings.sent5: The unprompted smile on her face showed genuine happiness.

meanings.definition: Happening without being planned or suggested.
meanings.sent1: The unprompted rain caught us off guard during the picnic.
meanings.sent2: An unprompted visit from a friend is always a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent3: The unprompted arrival of the pizza delivery guy made everyone cheer.
meanings.sent4: Her unprompted decision to join the dance class changed her life.
meanings.sent5: The unprompted applause filled the theater with joy.
